archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0567
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want hardware collected instore to be automatically linked and preconfigured to the customers subscription, so that the customer can easily setup and manage their hardware.

properties.value: to be discussed what it means for the process in Comarch For example when a device is dispatched (moment when a device leaves the warehouse or when a technicial installs a modem in customer's house), the serial number of the device is passed back to OSS for voice activation and BSS to store serial number. 2 different device management systems (Nokia HTM, TP-Link Cloud?) potentially need to be connected

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
